junit.runner
类 BaseTestRunner

java.lang.Object
  junit.runner.BaseTestRunner
所有已实现的接口：
TestListener
直接已知子类：
AndroidTestRunner
public abstract class BaseTestRunner
extends Object
implements TestListener

Base class for all test runners. This class was born live on stage in Sardinia during XP2000.
